title: Exquisite Open-work Bridal Set: Contemporary Haaram & Jhumkas
materials: Crafted in dual-tone (Rose and White) 18K Gold
meticulously designed with an open-work structure. Set with high-quality cubic zirconia for an elegant touch. Each piece has undergone the signature Hyderabad Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This stunning set features a contemporary Haaram design, incorporating traditional elements in a modern open-work structure. The necklace boasts a layered pattern, culminating in an intricate pendant. The matching Jhumkas echo the necklace's design, creating a harmonious and captivating look. The floral and leaf motifs add a delicate touch.
colors: Predominantly White Gold with Rose Gold accents
creating a beautiful contrast that enhances the overall design.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for upscale social events and formal gatherings.
description: A masterpiece of modern design with a touch of traditional charm. This lightweight set is comfortable to wear. The dazzling zirconia offers brilliance, making it a standout piece for any occasion. The dual-tone gold provides versatility and enhances the beauty of Indian attire.
